snippet: Nineteen attorneys general have signed onto a brief to the Supreme Court in support of a transgender teenager who wants to use the boys' bathroom at his Virginia high school, New York's chief law enforcement officer said Friday....

headline.main: After Kansas Shooting, a Community in Fear
headline.print_headline: After Kansas Shooting, a Community in Fear

lead_paragraph: Nineteen attorneys general have signed onto a brief to the Supreme Court in support of a transgender teenager who wants to use the boys' bathroom at his Virginia high school, New York's chief law enforcement officer said Friday.
